demos.title: Standalone Component
demos.teaches: Create standalone components without NgModule. Declare dependencies directly in the component decorator with imports, providers, and styles.

demos.title: Control Flow
demos.teaches: Use modern Angular control flow syntax with @if, @for, @switch, and @let. Replace ngIf, ngFor, and ngSwitch with cleaner, more performant alternatives.

demos.title: Content Projection
demos.teaches: Design flexible components with <ng-content> slots. Pass template content to child components using named projections and default content.

demos.title: Directives Composition
demos.teaches: Combine multiple directives on a single element to compose behaviors. Use hostDirectives to attach directives as component dependencies.

demos.title: Content Child
demos.teaches: Query projected content with @ContentChild and @ContentChildren. Access and interact with elements passed via content projection.

demos.title: View Queries
demos.teaches: Query template elements with @ViewChild and @ViewChildren. Obtain references to child components or DOM elements in the component view.

demos.title: Template vs Container
demos.teaches: Understand the difference between ng-template and ng-container. Control when and where template content is rendered in the DOM.

demos.title: Host Binding & Listener
demos.teaches: Manage component host properties and events with @HostBinding and @HostListener. Style the component element and respond to user interactions.

demos.title: Container Presenter
demos.teaches: Separate data logic (container) from presentation (presenter) components. Use this pattern for cleaner, more reusable component architecture.

demos.title: Dynamic Components
demos.teaches: Create and insert components dynamically at runtime using ViewContainerRef. Pass data to dynamic components and handle their lifecycle.

demos.title: Lazy Standalone Comp.
demos.teaches: Load standalone components on-demand via routes. Reduce initial bundle size by lazy loading features that aren't immediately needed.

demos.title: Load Standalone Apps
demos.teaches: Bootstrap standalone applications with bootstrapApplication(). Set up providers, routes, and configuration without NgModule.
